item.description:
Are you looking to move forward in life but having trouble deciding which direction to take?



OR are you somewhat satisfied in life but looking for that MISSING piece??



Join us for a night of self-exploration & fun! Where we will Discover YOUR PERSONAL Recipe for Success!


What exactly is MY PERSONAL Recipe for Success?

YOUR PERSONAL Recipe for Success is a combination of your own unique needs & wants, aka 'individual' ingredients combined with many 'foundational' success ingredients.

I believe that there are 'individual' as well as 'foundational' ingredients that need to be in place for you to reach your ultimate happiness & success. To become successful we have to take the time to find our unique values, talents, interests & wants and combine it with numerous foundational type success ingredients.

WHY it WORKS

Words hold more meaning and energy than simply the dictionary. The words we use, can give us clues on how/where to take the direction of our lives, help boost our self-esteem & increase our overall happiness.

Fresh off the release of my 'Life Recipe for Success' Audio Series where I raise awareness to certain 'foundational' success ingredients these events are geared towards helping you find your 'individual' success ingredients. Combine the two and vvwwalllaa...you have YOUR PERSONAL Recipe for Success!

This evening will be worth its weight in gold as it was ONE of THE MOST influential pieces I've ever done to help guide myself in the direction of where I wanted to take my life.

Come find out YOUR PERSONAL recipe for success...

I will facilitate & guide the evening, please come open minded-relaxed and ready for fun...

6:00-6:30pm Appetizer Mix n Mingle
6:30-7:00pm Intros & exercises
7:00-8:00pm Recap- Open Discussion

Hope to see you there!

Much love n light!
Dani Lynn
Radio Host~Life Coach~Motivational Speaker
www.liferecipeforsuccess.com
item.name: Discover YOUR PERSONAL Recipe for Success!!
